programme.title: Homeland Guardian
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60's in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development. He, KEUNG and HUI MAN BILL (Chan Kam Hung, Sunny) organized a development company and earned their first bucket of gold. When TIM was happy with his achievement, his enemy had broken his brother's legs. TIM suffered a great blow and decided to reform. On the other hand, BILL, stressed on principle, was surprised to find that his respected master in fact was corrupt.

programme.title: I Will Be Back

Different Amazon enthusiasts, along with Tony Hung, Elizabeth Nicole Wu, and Jason Bootwala, reveal the true face of the Amazon. They visit the homes of influencers with millions of followers, experience the Wi-Fi life of modern indigenous people, learn wilderness survival skills from Brazilian soldiers, and discover the reasons behind the brave volunteer firefighters who bravely fight mountain fires to protect the forest. They also challenge popular perceptions by visiting Amazon properties, getting haircuts, learning dance, performing magic tricks, and even engaging in art, all while discovering an incredible Amazon journey.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60's in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. programme.title: Gods Of Honour
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a 'Fire master' in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING's third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Meanwhile, Shang Dynasty emperor ZHOU (CHENG TSE SHING, TIMOTHY) abandons his empire for his mistress TANGIE (WAN PIK HAR, IRENE) and puts the empire in jeopardy. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Homeland Guardian
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

programme.title: I've Got The Power

Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character. However, he has offended crime boss Ho Hing-lung (Jimmy Au) because of his deeds. He has also troubled his close friends Or Tsui-ping (Tiffany Lau) and Ko Shau (Jazz Lam), and his uncle Yuen Ka-fu.

He also buried SUKI's spirit inside a figurine, hoping to resurrect her, but failed. LI's spirit wanders between heaven and hell for thousands of years. He finally becomes the king of spirits after absorbing spirits from many dead soldiers during a major battle in the Ming dynasty.

Matters of love, relationships, and even same-sex relationships are endlessly discussed topics for men and women alike. programme.title: Gods Of Honour
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a 'Fire master' in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING's third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Meanwhile, Shang Dynasty emperor ZHOU (CHENG TSE SHING, TIMOTHY) abandons his empire for his mistress TANGIE (WAN PIK HAR, IRENE) and puts the empire in jeopardy. NAR JAR pulls himself together again under his mother and friends' help and fights against ZHOU's army for the civilians.

programme.title: Hong Kong Review 2025
programme.desc: Entering 2025, the pace of Hong Kong's recovery remains uncertain. Business closures continue, unemployment rates are rising in some sectors, and factors such as the tariff war are impacting the Hong Kong economy. Furthermore, the second half of the year saw the discovery of asphalt particles in drinking water at Queen's Hill, the government's procurement of counterfeit drinking water from Xin Ding Xin, and a level-five fire at Hong Fuk Court in Tai Po resulting in multiple deaths and injuries, repeatedly testing the government's response capabilities. This year also marks the fifth anniversary of the implementation of the Hong Kong National Security Law, with many national security cases reaching conclusions and numerous political parties and civic groups announcing their dissolution. However, the government states that national security risks have not yet been eliminated. With the Legislative Council elections at the end of the year and several new officials taking office, will they bring a fresh perspective to Hong Kong's governance?

programme.title: L'Escargot
programme.desc: Renovation contractor KWAN KA-ON (Miu Kiu Wai) is the elder of four siblings, while his wife SZE LONG-KIU (Sonija Kwok) is a typical housewife. Buying a house is their longtime dream. But when his eldest brother, KWAN KA-HONG's business goes under, they shelve their plan to help him overcome his difficulties. KIU has to look for a job too. Unwilling to see ON shoulder the burden on his own, KWAN KA-LOK (Linda Chung), the third of the siblings, turns to her supervisor GAO WANG-CHIM (Michael Tse) for assistance, resulting in her taking part in an indecent proposal. Her boyfriend, TING KOON-FUNG (Ron Ng), breaks up angrily with her when he finds out about their affair. KWAN KA-WING (Him Law), the youngest of the four, prefers spending to saving and decides that he will in no circumstances help in the service of the mortgage. programme.title: Blessing of Formosa
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Homeland Guardian & What's On Today
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The

After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LI's spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation. He also buried SUKI's spirit inside a figurine, hoping to resurrect her, but failed. LI's spirit wanders between heaven and hell for thousands of years. He finally becomes the king of spirits after absorbing spirits from many dead soldiers during a major battle in the Ming dynasty.

programme.title: Open Book

Patrick Sir, a well-read bibliophile, joins forces with young readers like Oscar Tao and Honey Ho to reaffirm the value of physical books. Each episode introduces a great book, opening up scientific texts, historical literature, novels, and even fashion magazines to share interesting knowledge discovered within the pages. When was the last time you thoroughly read an entire book? Take inspiration from the reading lists of top book lovers, take action, leave some breathing room in your busy life, and rekindle your reading habits to enrich yourself!

programme.title: Gods Of Honour

He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Meanwhile, Shang Dynasty emperor ZHOU (CHENG TSE SHING, TIMOTHY) abandons his empire for his mistress TANGIE (WAN PIK HAR, IRENE) and puts the empire in jeopardy. programme.desc: Renovation contractor KWAN KA-ON (Miu Kiu Wai) is the elder of four siblings, while his wife SZE LONG-KIU (Sonija Kwok) is a typical housewife. Buying a house is their longtime dream. But when his eldest brother, KWAN KA-HONG's business goes under, they shelve their plan to help him overcome his difficulties. KIU has to look for a job too. Unwilling to see ON shoulder the burden on his own, KWAN KA-LOK (Linda Chung), the third of the siblings, turns to her supervisor GAO WANG-CHIM (Michael Tse) for assistance, resulting in her taking part in an indecent proposal. Her boyfriend, TING KOON-FUNG (Ron Ng), breaks up angrily with her when he finds out about their affair. KWAN KA-WING (Him Law), the youngest of the four, prefers spending to saving and decides that he will in no circumstances help in the service of the mortgage.
